item.title: Developer Update | Introducing Wrecking Ball | Overwatch (EU)
item.summary:
Game Director Jeff Kaplan introduces Overwatch’s 28th hero, WRECKING BALL.
Join Jeff as he provides some insight to Wrecking Ball’s back story, abilities, and overall strategy. Wrecking Ball is currently available for testing on the PTR.

item.title: Overwatch - ALL Hammond Skins and Items! (Wrecking Ball Cosmetics!)
item.summary: All Wrecking Ball (Hammond) Skins, Items, Sprays, Emotes Victory Poses and Highlight Intros! Wrecking Ball Mayhem skin is insane!!!
